events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible since this is not what I ordered.
The issue was identified as related to a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
Support agent Alex has been assigned to manage this refund case and contact the customer shortly.
Hello, this is Alex from support. I understand you received the wrong product and want a refund. I'm here to help you.
Could you please provide your order number and if you still have the packaging or any photos of the product you received?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I still have the package and took several pictures showing the incorrect item.
Thank you for the information. We will start the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send the product back.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response. I will send the product back as soon as I receive the label.
The refund process has been initiated and the return label emailed. You should see the refund credited to your original payment method within 5 business days after the return.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and if there is anything else we can support you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks for the excellent customer service and quick resolution.
Closing the case as the refund has been completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their support experience.
